description: Cuts to States of Guernsey spending in the future are "very likely", senior politician says.
title: States of Guernsey funding requests 'effectively call for tax rises'
title_page: States of Guernsey funding requests 'effectively call for tax rises' - BBC News
maintext: Mr Helyar said: "We don't just have to increase tax, we have to look at saving costs, we have to look at increasing efficiency and we also have to look at improving the economy, because a relatively small amount of economic growth is enough to cover that gap.
